articles.title: India's COVID deaths cross 500000 but some analysts count millions more - Reuters India
articles.description: India's official COVID-19 death toll crossed 500,000 on Friday, a level some data analysts said was breached last year but was obscured by inaccurate surveys and unaccounted dead in the hinterlands, where millions remain vulnerable to the disease.
